potential.label: Potential
potential.tip: Electric potential to set on the electrode during simulation.

type.label: Electrode type
type.tip: Clocked electrodes have sinusoidal potentials, unclocked electrodes are fixed.

angle.label: Angle
angle.tip: Angle of rotation in degrees. Center of rotation is the center of the electrode.

net.label: Net ID
net.tip: Net identifer. Used to calculate capacitances for entire nets instead of single conductors.
